name: Test Drive Unlimited 2
content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Atari/TDU2/UpLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: win7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /DIR="C:/Program Files/Atari/TDU2"
    description: Installing game
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: dinput8
    description: Installing dinput8
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: dotnet20sp2
    arch: win32
    description: Installing .NET 2.0
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: dotnet35sp1
    arch: win32
    description: Installing .NET 3.5
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
